roleset.name: Be different, not the same, unusual

role.descr: thing that is different; first item if seperate

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to differ.02. Differ.02 is a member of Vn class differ-23.4. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Comparison-y example
example.text: A comprehensive review of systems is negative other than symptoms in the history of present illness.
example.arg: than symptoms in the history of present illness
